metadata.dc:subject: BODY WEIGHT/effect of drugs on
SOMATOTROPIN/effects
metadata.dc:title: 30 casos inyectando intraarterialmente hormona somatotropíca, que produce aumento de estatura de 2 à 4 ctms. en 3 ó 4 meses.
[30 Cases of intra-arterial injection of somatotropic hormone which produces a 2-4 cm. increase in height in 3-4 months].
